word: Encouragement should be given to the precious lambs of the flock. Said the Majesty of heaven, "Suffer the little children to come unto Me, and forbid them not; for of such is the kingdom of God" [Mark 10:14]. He does not send those children to the rabbis. He does not send them to the Pharisees. He says, The mothers who have brought their children to Me have done well. "Suffer the little children to come unto me, and forbid them not; for of such is the kingdom of God."
